That talk-show experience combined with a high profile in Congress has made him a familiar face and name to many Hoosiers, Eric Holcomb said. He has a built-in advantage, but it's a big state and it requires many days on the road to campaign successfully, he said. Jim Bopp, a Terre Haute attorney who also is a Republican National Committee member, said Mike Pence could be hard to beat if he runs for Eric Holcomb .

This nation faces serious challenges that will require us to renew our commitment to the institutions that are resilient enough to lead America back, Mike Pence said. " I believe those are, the institutions are, and have always been, faith, family, community and state government. To renew our nation we must have a renewal of American federalism.

The same person says: Unless something miraculous happens and we get an unexpected gift candidate, I guess true believing conservatives will have to stop bad things from happening and see what emerges. I'd give Congressman Mike Pence much more credit than that. He can be a good governor. Good governors are powerful.
